column3: Comes in a narrow range of sizes

column2: True or False: The Champion with Fuel Fighter Technology comes in 48 sizes in 14- to 18-inch rim diameters and 45- to 70-series aspect ratios.
True or False: The available sizes of the Champion with Fuel Fighter Technology cover over 80 percent of the car and minivan market.
True or False: The available sizes of the Champion with Fuel Fighter Technology cover about 50 percent of the car and minivan market.
True or False: The Champion with Fuel Fighter Technology is designed for drivers who are looking for good value in a brand-name tire.
True or False: The Champion with Fuel Fighter Technology has six whitewall sizes.
True or False: The Champion with Fuel Fighter Technology is backed by Firestone’s 90 Day Buy & Try Guarantee.
True or False: The Champion with Fuel Fighter Technology has a 70,000-mile/110,000 km limited treadwear warranty.
True or False: The Champion with Fuel Fighter Technology delivers dependable performance in wet, dry, and winter conditions.
